content: Unlike other spells, these aren’t found on the main story path and need to be searched for throughout the game’s different chapters.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Transformation_Spells.md', within the main section titled 'Transformation Spells'.
The content is as follows:
Unlike other spells, these aren’t found on the main story path and need to be searched for throughout the game’s different chapters.
